originalText.text: Wonderful staff and fantastic doctor. The office is clean and well organized and the environment is welcoming and professional. Dr. Steinberg is thorough, communicative, and has some of the best bedside manner I've ever experienced. 100/10 would recommend

text.text: Wonderful staff and fantastic doctor. The office is clean and well organized and the environment is welcoming and professional. Dr. Steinberg is thorough, communicative, and has some of the best bedside manner I've ever experienced. 100/10 would recommend

originalText.text: Love Dr. Steinberg and her office. Have been seeing her for a bunch of years, and recommend her to everyone. She is thorough, conscientious, and easy to deal with. Her staff is great. Easy to get an appointment too.

text.text: Love Dr. Steinberg and her office. Have been seeing her for a bunch of years, and recommend her to everyone. She is thorough, conscientious, and easy to deal with. Her staff is great. Easy to get an appointment too.

originalText.text: I woke up one morning this week with a bump on my eyelid and was obviously worried. When I contacted Dr Steinberg’s office, they let me come in that afternoon and were very understanding about my having to bring my toddler along. I really appreciated how nicely everyone treated me. Dr Steinberg diagnosed the stye and came up with a treatment plan. Everything is going as well as it can.

text.text: I woke up one morning this week with a bump on my eyelid and was obviously worried. When I contacted Dr Steinberg’s office, they let me come in that afternoon and were very understanding about my having to bring my toddler along. I really appreciated how nicely everyone treated me. Dr Steinberg diagnosed the stye and came up with a treatment plan. Everything is going as well as it can.

originalText.text: Came in for emergency - had an eye infection. I was seen right away,  staff is always amazing and Dr. Steinberg  is great. I have been seeing for her for a number of years. I higky recommend.!❤️

text.text: Came in for emergency - had an eye infection. I was seen right away,  staff is always amazing and Dr. Steinberg  is great. I have been seeing for her for a number of years. I higky recommend.!❤️

originalText.text: Dr. Steinberg is a good listener, spends time with you, and seems to be careful and skillful. I feel like she is a partner in my eye health.  She discusses issues and offers options. I never feel she is rushed.  Her staff is lovely.
